properties.title: Pumptrack Kleine Allmend
properties.abstract: A highlight on Kleine Allmend in Bern is the attractive asphalt pump track with rollers and turns. It was built on an existing slight slope. Bike fans, big and small, can create their own lines on the 85 m track.
properties.description:
The asphalt pump track located at Kleine Allmend is open all year round and can be used in any weather. It is particularly popular with children and teens as it allows them to playfully improve their skills on two wheels. The surrounding small hills encourage the riders you to create their own line. 

Several turns and rollers are spread out over a length of 85 m. The pump track was built on an existing slight slope. Together with a grass field, a sandbox, and a grilling place with tables and benches, it is part of the Kleine Allmend nature park and bike playground close to the Wankdorf football stadium and the Ostermundigen railway station.


Length: 85 m
Surface: asphalt
